flavor_text_entries.gold:
It spins string
not only from its
rear but also from its mouth. It is
hard to tell which
end is which.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
A single strand of
a special string
is endlessly spun out of its rear.
The string leads
back to its nest.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
Rather than mak­
ing a nest in one
specific spot, it wanders in search
of food after
darkness falls.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
ARIADOS’s feet are tipped with tiny
hooked claws that enable it to scuttle
on ceilings and vertical walls. This POKéMON constricts the foe with
thin and strong silk webbing.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:

thin and strong silk webbing.

endlessly spun out of its rear. The string

flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
It spins string not only from its rear but
also from its mouth. It is hard to tell
which end is which.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
It attaches silk to its prey and
sets it free. Later, it tracks the
silk to the prey and its friends.

sets it free. Later, it tracks the
silk to the prey and its friends.

flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Ariados’s feet are tipped with tiny hooked claws that enable it
to scuttle on ceilings and vertical walls. This Pokémon
constricts the foe with thin and strong silk webbing.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Ariados’s feet are tipped with tiny hooked claws that enable it
to scuttle on ceilings and vertical walls. This Pokémon
constricts the foe with thin and strong silk webbing.
flavor_text_entries.sun:
There are some areas where people use the
string Ariados spins for their own weaving.
The resulting cloth is popular for its strength.
flavor_text_entries.moon:
It spins thread from both its rear and its mouth.
Then it wraps its prey up in thread and sips
their bodily fluids at its leisure.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
Every night, it wanders around in search of
prey, whose movements it restrains by spewing
threads before it bites into them with its fangs.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
It spews threads from its mouth to catch its
prey. When night falls, it leaves its web to go
hunt aggressively.
